Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VisitorController, Observer

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements VisitorController, Observer
    manage all logic of the game
    Author:
    Gabriele Guelfi
